fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player to clean. For the rest of the game, if they ever die while you're alive, you'll hide their role and will with everyone but the Mafia. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Once per game, you may swap who you currently have cleaned.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who will not submit to the new Mafia.
